boardgame.name: Im Wandel der Zeiten: Das Würfelspiel – Eisenzeit
Roll Through the Ages: The Iron Age
boardgame.description: Roll Through the Ages: The Iron Age, a sequel to the highly-awarded Roll Through the Ages: The Bronze Age, lets you build an Iron Age civilization in under an hour! Do you build provinces, raise armies, and conquer barbarians or build ports and ships to gain trade goods? Explore the strategies of Greece, Phoenicia, and Rome as you erect monuments, fend off disasters, and strive to feed your people._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Roll Through the Ages: The Iron Age gives players different ways to build their empires: the Trade and Naval strategies of the Phoenicians, the conquests of Alexander the Great, and the engineering prowess and gradual absorption of new provinces by the Roman Republic._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Grab those dice _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; including the Fate die _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and prepare to build the greatest empire as you continue to roll through the ages!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Roll Through the Ages: The Iron Age games that include the Mediterranean Expansion have their own game entry at Roll Through the Ages: The Iron Age with Mediterranean Expansion._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Cult of the New Board Game Podcast Episode 022 – Origins 2016
Ep 070 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; 3rd Anniversary Special _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Tournament to the Death!!!
Episode 59 - Delve into the BetaBotz of Port Royal

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: New in shrink. Kickstarter edition with mediterranean expansion.

Kickstarter edition with Mediterranean expansion included. Eagle games did not send the metal pegs. Played once. Postage is £3.78 in the UK with MyHermes. Contact me for international shipping costs. Happy to deliver in person in SW/central London. Open to offers on price.
New in shrink retail edition.
Includes the mediterranean expansion. Only played a handful of times (most of the score sheets are still there. We only used up 5 or 6 of the 50 included). USPS Shipping: $10. U.S. only.
Played once (only one sheet used). Includes Mediterranean expansion.

Gryphon Games (GRY101439N) Build an iron age civilization - in under an hour! Do you build provinces, armies, and conquer barbarians or build ports and ships to gain trade goods? Explore the strategies of Greece, Phoenicia, and Rome as you erect monuments, fend off disasters, and strive to feed your people. Grab those dice - including the fate die - and prepare to build the greatest empire as you Roll through the Ages!

Gryphon Games (GRY101439N) Build an iron age civilization - in under an hour! Do you build provinces, armies, and conquer barbarians or build ports and ships to gain trade goods? Explore the strategies of Greece, Phoenicia, and Rome as you erect monuments, fend off disasters, and strive to feed your people. Grab those dice - including the fate die - and prepare to build the greatest empire as you Roll through the Ages!

The game: Pegasus (c) 2014. GERMAN EDITION! All game materials are still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within Germany I prefer the standard-bank-tranfer (IBAN). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside Germany Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.
